Title: Relates to the renewal of bond anticipation notes
Summary: Limits the renewal of bond anticipation notes issued between 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 so that it may not extend for more than seven years beyond the original date of issue.
LawCode: Amd ยง23.00, Loc Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the local finance law, in relation to the renewal of bond anticipation notes
